name: Splash Media
tagline: We connect brands with their digital selves.
description: Splash Media is a full service digital marketing agency. We leverage online communities, content and channels to drive business results for our clients. Our unique blend of Emmy award-winning video production and digital solutions is transformative for brands and consumers.
